CustomField.formula: IF(OR( TEXT(Status) = "Requested Demo via Web", TEXT(Status) = "5-Intro Call Scheduled", TEXT(Status) = "6-Intro Call Held", TEXT(Status) = "7-Discovery Call Scheduled", TEXT(Status) = "8-Discovery Call Held", TEXT(Status) = "9-SAL" ), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Early Stage
